House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00108
FULL TITLE : AN ACT ESTABLISHING THE EMERGENCY MANAGEMENT AGENCY (EMA), AMENDING FOR THIS PURPOSE REPUBLIC ACT NUMBERED 10121, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
SHORT TITLE : Emergency Management Agency Act Of 2016
ABSTRACT : Creates a permanent, full-time national agency to help the country plan and prepare for emergencies; takes over the National Disaster Coordinating Council (NDCC) and undertake disaster mitigation and preparedness measures as well as quick response mechanism.
